name: Twilio Flex Sample Backend in Python
description: A Twilio Flex sample backend in Python

TWILIO_OUTBOUND_WORKFLOW_SID.description: The SID of the workflow you just created - used for creating tasks

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: The account SID of your Twilio account - used for calling Twilio APIs

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: The auth token of your Twilio account - used for calling Twilio APIs

TWILIO_FLEX_WORKSPACE_SID.description: TaskRouter Flex Assignment Workspace SID, generated when creating a Twilio Flex project

EXTERNAL_HOST.description: The host that exposes this service - used for telling Twilio where to make callbacks when calling the Twilio APIs. Should be of the form <HEROKU_APP_NAME>.herokuapp.com
